recipe.name: Banana Bread
recipe.ingredients: 191 grams (1 1/2 cups) all purpose flour 1 teaspoon baking soda 3 large bananas (about 375 grams) 113 grams unsalted butter (1 stick) 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 egg 1/2 cup sugar

step.describe: Spray an 8x4 loaf pan with baking spray. Set the oven for 350 degrees.
Add flour and baking soda to the bowl while running. Press Cook Again until fully incorporated. Do not overmix –it’s fine if there are still a few small lumps.

Pour the batter into the prepared 8x4 loaf pan and bake at 350 degrees for about an hour, until a toothpick inserted into the loaf comes out clean. Check the loaf about 10 minutes early and cook longer, as needed.
